title: Frank Zappa - Playground Psychotics (1992) Rec. 1970-1971
description:
â€œPlayground Psychoticsâ€ features recordings of Zappa and his band, the Mothers of Invention, around the time of the film â€œ200 Motelsâ€. 

The live material on â€œPlayground Psychoticsâ€ is interspersed with excerpts from taped conversations among band members whilst on tour, and the release includes three conceptual sections: 
â€œA Typical Day on the Road, Part 1â€, a collage of dialogue which opens the first disc; â€œA Typical Day on the Road, Part 2â€, which opens the second disc and â€œThe True Story of 200 Motelsâ€, which appears at the end of disc two.
 
The album also includes a live session with John Lennon and Yoko Ono (Disc 1, #22-26), an alternate mix of which appears on Lennon's Some Time in New York City (1972).
